description: This app is simple easy basics for everyday use for home use. Don,t care much for the icon image of the duck. But thats not the point it works perfectly and does what I want. Need something to remind me of my doctor appointments and it does just that. The reminder pops up in righthand side of taskbar and behold I remember my appointments now. Thanks for the app. This is great for someone who has no business just bad memory for appointments.
I was looking for a reminder app that could pop reminder every couple of minutes throughout the day but apparently this functionality has not been implemented yet.
summary: Missing the every X minute reminders

description: App itself works. Sadly it won't integrate into your GTK desktop. I really want to use my GTK theme. I can't stand a download symbol to minimize and all that.
summary: It works nicely, but does not integrate into you gtk desktop

description: C'EST TROP GÉNIAL, ÇA MARCHE SUPER !!!! C'EST EXACTEMENT CE QUE JE VOULAIS TÉLÉCHARGER !
